sentences.sContent: Management need to explore ways of improving office security.
sentences.sCn: 管理层需要探讨如何加强办事处的安全措施。

sentences.sContent: I’m going to explore the possibility of a part-time job.
sentences.sCn: 我要好好想想兼职工作的可能性。

trans.tranCn: 勘探， 探究， 探索 A
trans.tranOther: to discuss or think about something carefully
